Html:
Hello.

I'm trying to send a key stroke to an shockwave application.

I already tried all the standard approaches (SendKeys, PostMessage), and without luck so far...

Unfortunately, InputSimulator doesn't seem do to the trick neither..... Any ideas on why?

Is it possible for a shockwave application to actually be able to determine that the key stroke comes from an application an not actually from the real keyboard  (and thus be the reason why it don't work...)?

Any suggestion for work-arounds?

Thanks in advance.
